_aChangeLog.text: Reduced timers after spider boss fight and increased the ZM tp time after that.
Added more time for zombies to teleport after surf02-03. (45seconds for humans to complete surf/bhop levels)
Fixed the jump part near spawn. Reduced jump distance and removed Human killer trigger.
Added more hp to all bosses hitbox, all hitboxes are fixed.
Removed a box on the first defence so humans won't always camp there.

_sText:
** ze_surf_sphinx_stronghold_a5 **
** Map made for NiDE Mapping Contest 2024 **

Map contains:
- 2 Different Endings (Sphinx and Stronghold)
- 3 Boss Fights 
  1. Strider
  2. Charger
  3. Alien Spider(only on sphinx ending)
- 2 Items for Zombies (Zombie Speeder & Zombie Invisibility)
- 1 Destructive Item for Humans - Railgun - Cooldown = 105(s)
- 6 Surf Levels
- 3 Alternate Routes for Surf (incase people prefer bhop easier with low gravity)
- Hardest map in Zombie Escape Surf History (!nerfed it now)
- Lasers at the end of the round in Sphinx Ending
- 64 Spawns

** You are not allowed to edit, re-upload and port this map. This map is made for CS:S Only **
